title: Chloe Ferry's surgically enhanced curves threaten to burst out of tiny bikini on Dubai break
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Chloe Ferry has an impressive wardrobe of microscopic bikinis.

And the reality star, 23, nailed another eye-popping look as she posed for photographers in possibly her smallest bikini yet.

The Geordie Shore star flaunted her surgically enhanced curves in a scantily clad, snakeskin print bikini while holidaying in sun-soaked Dubai this week.

The TV bombshell was nearly bursting out of the cropped top as she soaked up the scorching hot rays in Dubai's sweltering sunshine.

To match, Chloe wore equally tiny stringed-thong bottoms which scarcely covered her modesty while she lounged about at the pool.

The blonde beauty kept her beach look glamorous as she added heavy make-up and arranged her golden locks in perfectly blow-dried waves.

(Image: BACKGRID)

(Image: BACKGRID)

Chloe reportedly had a Brazillian bum lift last year, having the fat harvested from her thighs and belly and injected into her buttocks.

She debuted her latest surgery enhancements as she strolled around the poolside setting in Dubai and dipped in the water to cool off.

Also Chloe courted attention with her golden fake-tanned skin and seriously toned stomach.

She previously confessed to The Sun that she had spent over £50,000 on surgery.

She said: "It's a lot more, I can tell you that. £50k - I wish! I'm bankrupt... I'm not really. I want more."

(Image: BACKGRID)

(Image: BACKGRID)

(Image: BACKGRID)

(Image: BACKGRID)

She added: "I just love injections and getting filler, to be honest. If you don't like something about yourself, get it changed."

Chloe's raunchy display left little to the imagination and is likely to have captured the attention of her ex-boyfriend Sam Gowland .

Its been a whirlwind few weeks for Chloe as she partied with Katie Price and got rid of her ex Sam and former Geordie Shore co-star for good.

(Image: BACKGRID)

(Image: BACKGRID)

Sam accused Chloe of ' lying, cheating and selling fake stories ' while she accused him of having sex with Love Island babe Amber Davies.

But last month the reality star appeared to be over the heartache as she enjoyed a string of boozy nights out with former glamour model, Katie .

Newly-single Chloe appeared to reunite with her ex Sam in Dubai recently on a secret holiday but the pair seem to have gone their separate ways for good now.
description: The Geordie Shore star barely contained her eye-popping assets as she posed up a storm during her recent Dubai trip
